citations.narrative:
In retail cage #2, the nest box has exposed nails and a jagged edges from chewing by a bird. Structures in bird
enclosures that are not kept in good repair can lead to harm or injury to the birds.
Interior surfaces and surfaces that come in contact with birds must be free of jagged edges or sharp points that could
injure the birds.
Correct by 9/3/25
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.150(c)(3) 
   
Facilities, general. 
In retail cage #2, the nest box has exposed nails and a jagged edges from chewing by a bird. Structures in bird 
enclosures that are not kept in good repair can lead to harm or injury to the birds. 
 
Interior surfaces and surfaces that come in contact with birds must be free of jagged edges or sharp points that could 
injure the birds. 
Correct by 9/3/25 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative. 
 
 n
